title: have a bug with Shop
body: Hi i cant use my shop to buy rune or champions and its saying  Session expired  and i tried reinstall game and restarting game nothing happend still the same pls help

replies.body: It sounds like there may be an issue with your settings, specifically with Internet Explorer,  that is preventing access to the store.  For your specific issue, I recommend following the steps in our [Store Error](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753054-Store-Error-Session-Expired-There-was-a-problem-with-your-request-) guide to get this fixed for good.  Please let me know if you have any further issues with this!
if someone knows how to make it good again pls tell me
